title: coprocessor_plugin_api get rebuild every time running `make dev`
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
Nightly

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
Doesn't matter.

### Steps to reproduce
```
% make dev
Security check passed.
Docker build check passed.
License check passed.
warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
   Compiling coprocessor_plugin_api v0.1.0
   Compiling tikv-server v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv-ctl v0.0.1
    Checking tikv v6.6.0-alpha
    Checking example_coprocessor_plugin v0.1.0
    Checking resolved_ts v0.0.1
    Checking snap_recovery v0.1.0
    Checking backup v0.0.1
    Checking backup-stream v0.1.0
    Checking cdc v0.0.1
    Checking server v0.0.1
    Checking test_raftstore v0.0.1
    Checking test_storage v0.0.1
    Checking test_backup v0.0.1
    Checking test_coprocessor v0.0.1
    Checking tests v0.0.1
    Finished dev [unoptimized] target(s) in 11.53s
./scripts/test-all -- --nocapture
warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
   Compiling coprocessor_plugin_api v0.1.0
   Compiling tikv-ctl v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv-server v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv v6.6.0-alpha
Ctrl-C
% make dev
Security check passed.
Docker build check passed.
License check passed.
warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
   Compiling coprocessor_plugin_api v0.1.0
   Compiling tikv-server v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv-ctl v0.0.1
    Checking tikv v6.6.0-alpha
    Checking example_coprocessor_plugin v0.1.0
    Checking resolved_ts v0.0.1
    Checking snap_recovery v0.1.0
    Checking backup v0.0.1
    Checking backup-stream v0.1.0
    Checking cdc v0.0.1
    Checking server v0.0.1
    Checking test_raftstore v0.0.1
    Checking test_storage v0.0.1
    Checking test_backup v0.0.1
    Checking test_coprocessor v0.0.1
    Checking tests v0.0.1
    Finished dev [unoptimized] target(s) in 11.53s
./scripts/test-all -- --nocapture
warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
   Compiling coprocessor_plugin_api v0.1.0
   Compiling tikv-ctl v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv-server v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv v6.6.0-alpha
...
```

### What did you expect?
```
% make dev
Security check passed.
Docker build check passed.
License check passed.
warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
   Compiling coprocessor_plugin_api v0.1.0
   Compiling tikv-server v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv-ctl v0.0.1
    Checking tikv v6.6.0-alpha
    Checking example_coprocessor_plugin v0.1.0
    Checking resolved_ts v0.0.1
    Checking snap_recovery v0.1.0
    Checking backup v0.0.1
    Checking backup-stream v0.1.0

    Checking test_storage v0.0.1

    Checking tests v0.0.1

warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
   Compiling coprocessor_plugin_api v0.1.0
   Compiling tikv-ctl v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv-server v0.0.1
   Compiling tikv v6.6.0-alpha
Ctrl-C
% make dev
Security check passed.
Docker build check passed.
License check passed.
warning: profile package spec `tirocks-sys` in profile `dev` did not match any packages
    Finished dev [unoptimized] target(s) in 1.01s
./scripts/test-all -- --nocapture
...
```

### What did happened?
